segments.text: Mrcrabby , I ’ m pleased to see you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ Ve looked over your resume , ms.Jane . I see you ’ Ve already have quite a lot of experience in secretary work , could you tell me something about your talent with that company ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , yes , I worked there for two years , just graduated from college .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It was a good company to work for , I enjoyed my time with them .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I like it very much , the work was not very demanding , and the people I work with were friendly .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why do you want to leave the company ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Because it is an age of challenges , I must accept the new challenge in my life .
segments.speaker: S1
